name: ammonia:NAD+ oxidoreductase; NADH:hydroxylamine oxidoreductase
definition: Ammonia + NAD+ + H2O <=> Hydroxylamine + NADH + H+
comment: not using NADH directly, but electron-transferring (ec 1.7.99.1, see R00284)
